Class ProviderRecordCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecordCollection
      • ProviderRecordCollection

  • public class ProviderRecordCollection
extends RecordCollection
    Author:
    Alex Anderson Collection of provider records. Allows for reading, saving, adding, editing, and removing provider records.

    • Constructor Summary

      ProviderRecordCollection(java.lang.String FileName)
      Initialize collection with file.
